tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_generation_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id UUID,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  collection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE waste_trends ( 
 trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 location_id INT, 
 year INT, 
 waste_type VARCHAR(50), 
 trend_value DECIMAL, 
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES waste_reports(location_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE Locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_generation (
    generation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    generation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    generation_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE waste_generation (
  generation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  waste_type_id INT NOT NULL,
  generation_date DATE,
  generation_rate DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (waste_type_id) REFERENCES waste_type(waste_type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_trend (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_month INT NOT NULL,
  trend_year INT NOT NULL,
  trend_rate DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE,
  report_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);
